problem.markdown:
>>A soil's cation exchange capacity (CEC) is most dependent on which of the following? << () sand () silt (x) clay () rocks
[explanation] The cation exchange capacity (CEC) is most influenced by the presence of clay because clay has a negative surface charge that attracts and holds ions. [explanation]
